attributes.action: To add his weight to the Football League penalty of 15pts for Leeds Utd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
[this is a counter petetion against http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/lufc15points/]

The petitioners urge the Prime Minister to add his support to the Football League's stance and ask Leeds United FC to withdraw their writ from the High Court and to stand by the agreement they made with the League in August 2007, which allowed them to take part in the League One Season in the excpetional circumdtsnces that LUFC found themselves in which contravened the Leagues 'orderly affairs' policy.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
